## PeriodType type

Supported period types for an entitlement. - "normal" If the entitlement is not under an introductory or trial period. - "intro" If the entitlement is under an introductory period. - "trial" If the entitlement is under a trial period.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type PeriodType = "normal" | "intro" | "trial";
```
